Module globals ¶

Synopsis

Functions
globals.getClipboard()

Gets the text from the clipboard
globals.setClipboard()

Sets the text in the clipboard
globals.importLib()

Executes a lua file from the Scripts/Libs folder
globals.tableToJson()

Executes a lua file from the Scripts/Libs folder
globals.tableToJson()

Executes a lua file from the Scripts/Libs folder
globals.jsonToTable()

Executes a lua file from the Scripts/Libs folder
globals.sendLocalData()

Sends data to all modules via the LocalDataReceived event You need to uniquely identify the messages that you want via the uuid
globals.registerCommand()

Allows you to make a command in a module You dont need a command file but it does not show in .help
string.split()

Splits the string as expected
globals.getItem()

Gets an item from its name, you cannot render it tho as location is missing
globals.getClipboard() ¶

Gets the text from the clipboard

globals.setClipboard(newClipboardContent) ¶

Sets the text in the clipboard

globals.importLib(libraryName) ¶

Executes a lua file from the Scripts/Libs folder

globals.tableToJson(Table, pretty) ¶

Executes a lua file from the Scripts/Libs folder

globals.tableToJson(Table) ¶

Executes a lua file from the Scripts/Libs folder

globals.jsonToTable(JSON) ¶

Executes a lua file from the Scripts/Libs folder

globals.sendLocalData(uuid, data) ¶

Sends data to all modules via the LocalDataReceived event You need to uniquely identify the messages that you want via the uuid

globals.registerCommand(Command, OnExecuted) ¶

Allows you to make a command in a module You dont need a command file but it does not show in .help

string.split(text, splitter) ¶

Splits the string as expected

globals.getItem(name) ¶

Gets an item from its name, you cannot render it tho as location is missing
